com.quantcomponents.core.calendar
Interface ITradingCalendar

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPeriodicTradingCalendar, FlatCalendar, PeriodicTradingCalendar
public interface ITradingCalendar

Trading calendar entity. It maps any date with an instance of ITradingDay, and provides period of validity, time zone, and a readable name and description. Implementors of this interface are opaque, i.e. they don't expose the rules used to calculate the trading hours for each date.

See Also:
for a transparent implementation of this interface

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
Returns:
a readable compact name for the calendar (e.g. NASDAQ_AH)

getDescription

String getDescription()
Returns:
a longer description of the calendar

isIncludeAfterHours

Boolean isIncludeAfterHours()
Returns:
true if this calendar includes after hours trading

getExchanges

String[] getExchanges()
Returns:
the exchanges where it can be applied

getTimeZone

Returns:
the time zone of the calendar

Returns:

getEndDate

Date getEndDate()
Returns:
the first date when this calendar is expired

tradingDay

ITradingDay tradingDay(Date date)
This method returns an instance of ITradingDay for each date.

Parameters:
date - a Date object
Returns:
an object representing the trading hours of the input date
